Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 3/31/2013, off Chris Tillman (BAL)...
Injured on 8/6/2013 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2014, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $778,571 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 9/18/2015...
Won World Series with Kansas City in 2015...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,607,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2016, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,607,143 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Kansas City to Cleveland on 1/31/2017 (Going to CLE: SS Orlando Calixte, 3B Cheslor Cuthbert, 1B Eric Hosmer. Going to KC: 1B Xavier Scruggs, P Jose Gonzalez)...
9/1/2017: Signed a contract extension with Cleveland, $5,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2018, hitting .402 with 7 HR, 24 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2019, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 8/8/2019 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2019...
Drove in 8 runs against Minnesota on 4/11/2020...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (A) on 8/31/2020...

Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2021...

Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 6/8/2025...
8/1/2025: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $4,500,000 per year, for 3 years.

Released by Detroit on 4/3/2027...
